game.name: Kickups
game.description:
Hey boys, we have great news for you! Do you love kicking out the ball and sending it to the goal point? Are you unable to find out the playground where you can enjoy your favorite football game? We have brought to you a highly interesting and brand new soccer game where you can practice your craving for the sport in a life-like playground. Join Kickups and get ready to make some goals and become the biggest player of the soccer! 

You would lose the game if you fail in controlling the ball, so do not let it fall down to the ground. Put your best football handling abilities in this simple yet cool soccer themed game! Your primary objective is to keep the ball in the air long as you can. When you click the play button, you would be given a chance to kick the ball once. Make sure to keep your eyes on the screen and put your fingers on the mouse to juggle the ball up and try not to fall down to the ground. 

You will your ball going up a little with your each consecutive hit or kick on the ball. This will help you to add 1 point to your final score. Remember you can use the edges of the screen to bounce your ball. Try to become the master of both the modes including normal and challenge and see your name on the top of the leaderboards in this cool and fun boys sports game! Good luck to unlock all four achievements by putting the best of your efforts! Play more soccer based games for boys on atmegame.com and have fun with your friends, no download required!
